descriptionHtml:
*this mod goes well with another mod allowing multiple companions at once.

Meet Jericho Fallen & Gommor Beerson, two new citizens of skyrim ready to wreak havok on the world!

Jericho, a talented Nord with his trusty sword will slice through your enemies at will.

Gommor, a battle hardened imperial turned mercenary will fight behind you dropping enemies from a far with his bow.

(Gotta have the interesting background right??)

You can find either of these warriors in Whiterun sitting on separate benches under the big tree. (right before the stairs to where the yarl place is)

*Both NPCs are Essential meaning they will not die, only be knocked out for a short time if they lose all their health.

*This is now the base of a new mod i will be making, i will update this mod as i go with the new one as well as they will be similar in the sence of armors and textures.
Versions:
.01a - companions can be hired separately, not together unless you have another mod allowing you more than one companion. Available Now

.01b - A new guard armor i retextured to a nice orange. Available Now

*Any comments are welcome id like to make this mod a successful one, i want anything anyone has being criticism, suggestions, moral support (i like it), anything really =)
author: Hotshot9946
